questions.question_text_1: An analyst conducted a survey to understand the opinions of college students regarding the quality of education at their institution. He collected the data from 10 students as:   “Fair”, “Fair”, ”Excellent”, “Poor”, “Fair”, “Excellent”, “Poor”, “Poor”, “Excellent”, and “Poor”.  Based on the above data, answer the given subquestions.
